mapper.select: SELECT member_name ,member_no ,member_id ,healthclubs_name FROM member JOIN healthclubs ON member.healthclubs_no = healthclubs.healthclubs_no WHERE member_id=#{member_id};

SELECT healthclubs_admin_name ,healthclubs_admin_no ,healthclubs_admin_id FROM healthclubs_admin JOIN healthclubs ON healthclubs_admin.healthclubs_no = healthclubs.healthclubs_no WHERE healthclubs_admin_id=#{healthclubs_admin_id}
SELECT trainer_name ,trainer_no ,trainer_id FROM trainer JOIN healthclubs ON trainer.healthclubs_no = healthclubs.healthclubs_no WHERE trainer_id=#{trainer_id}
